en.name: Cinnabar Spindle
en.passiveDescription: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by {{40//50//60//70//80%}} of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

zh.name: 辰砂之纺锤
zh.passiveDescription: 元素战技造成的伤害值提高，提高数值相当于防御力的{{40//50//60//70//80%}}。该效果每1.5秒最多触发一次，并将在元素战技造成伤害后的0.1秒后清除效果。
